reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and perfect for summer wear, with a flattering fit that hits at the knees and works well for all body types. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find the fabric nice, others say it feels like t-shirt material. The length also gets mixed reviews, with some finding it great while others say it's too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!!
items.body: This dress is beautiful!! The Material is soft and comfortable and it hits in all the right places. Iâ€™m about 150 lbs and I got the M and it fit perfectly! Love the color and this style. Hides what it needs to. Go get you one! Read more
items.author: Caroline

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Classy
items.body: Love this dress!! The material is a good quality and has a good feel. Fits true to size. It was very comfortable and stylish. I havenâ€™t washed it yet, but I donâ€™t anticipate that being an issue. Read more
items.author: StacyH

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute little dress!
items.body: Super cute and comfy! Neckline is flattering, sleeves are perfect length, material def is quite thin and a little see through in direct sunlight. Very stretchy, I bought it as a maternity dress to wear to an event, itâ€™s almost knee length even with a little belly to lift it. Read more
items.author: Emmylou

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for a pretty dress
items.body: Although I didn't keep the dress I wanted to write a review. I am 5'4, 118 lbs and wore a size XS in the picture. As you can see it's a beautiful fit. The fabric is nice as well, not too flimsy. The reason I returned it is because of personal preference on the chest area. It has that beer garden girl look and unfortunately do not have the chest to fill it. Another reason is since the color is closer to a wine red than a burgundy red, I probably only would have worn it once. All in all though it's a great value. Read more
items.author: EP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: Very cute dress. I bought this for my teenage daughter to wear for a choir concert. It is cute and stylish for a teen or adult. Fits well and is stretchy and lightweight fabric. Read more
items.author: Heidi

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Colors could be far different than they appear
items.body: I've bought two of these dresses and I'm happy with the fit and the quality is decent. They are stretchy and comfortable. However the second dress I purchased was the pink floral dress and WOW the color was so very different that what it appeared online. I understand that it's not likely to be exactly what you see on your screen however the dress is at least three shades pinker, more of a barbie pink, and the flowers are neon pink, very different to the point it be in g a different style even. Disappointed with that, considering returning. Read more
items.author: Kirsten Wood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and true to size
items.body: Knee length and the material is comfortable I bought navy blue to wear to funerals and church. Very stylish and great price Read more
items.author: Copchop

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable
items.body: So so cute on!! Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€/185 lbs and it hits mid knee on me. I got the large and it is so adorable! Fits everywhere perfectly. Iâ€™m a 36C and bottom heavy. This accentuates the waist and then flares out over your tummy but not so much that it doesnâ€™t look super cute! Read more
items.author: Marie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Print Black Floral, Brown, Black Floral, Deep Green, Army Green, Coral Floral, Navy White Floral, Print Green Leaf, Print Orange White, Black, Lake, Black Pink Floral, Blue White Floral, Royal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
